alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Henderson, southwestern Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 725 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blue Goose, or 11 miles southeast of Milan, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Parkers Crossroads, Hickory Flat, Claybrook, Cedar Grove, Mount Gilead, Huron, Russell Crossroads, Palestine, Union Cross, Juno, Lavinia, Sand Ridge, Middle Fork, Timberlake, Hinson Springs and White Fern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
